extendedInfo.description: Got time to be kill while waiting for bus,coffee,ect.?Wanna have fun with little time but gain huge happy experience?Wanna have fun with little time but gain huge happy experience?Still remember called arcade games?Still remember called arcade games?Just join us,enjoy happy 'little' time!Just join us,enjoy happy 'little' time!The hottest arcade games ever!One click download the games and have fun.Unlimited Coins and Great Emulator, make classic games more joyful!Come on and find your childhood fun time!An arcade game (or coin-op) is a coin-operated entertainment machine, usually installed in public businesses, such as restaurants, bars, and particularly amusement arcades. Most arcade games are video games, pinball machines, electro-mechanical games, redemption games, and merchandisers (such as claw cranes).The golden age of arcade video games lasted from the late 1970s to the mid-1990s. While arcade games were still relatively popular during the late 1990s, the entertainment medium saw a continuous decline in popularity in the Western misphere when home-based video game consoles made the transition from 2D graphics to 3D graphics. Despite this, arcades remain popular in many parts of Asia as late as the early 2010s.The term "arcade game" is also, in recent times, used to refer to a video game that was designed to look like a classic arcade game (adopting an isometric view, 2D graphics, scores, lives, etc.) but instead released on platforms such as XBLA or PC.This game provide a new definition of arcade game,that is mainly because it largely provide you an attractive game visual, simple controls and exciting playing process which can make your playing journey be full of  challenges and joys.It will be a real eye-opener for you.So we strongly recommend this one to you,hope you can enjoy it.However I may aware you that "Love games, Love life. Never indulge in unreal world!"
